result.title: New extruder and extrusion process test results
result.description: Studies will be conducted of the new extruder and extrusion process ad will include the measurement of the distribution of the pressure p MPa and temperature T oC of the polymer along the plasticizing system and extruder head torque at the screw M Nm extrudate mass m kg time of energy measurement te s time of extrudate measurement tex s temperature of the extrudate T oC extrusion speed V ms as well as unit energy consumption EEC Jkg energy efficiency polymer output G kgh die swell power supplied to the extruder QC W power transferred by the polymer QN W
